templates: ${name} took three tests. ${subj} scored ${val1}, ${val2}, and ${val3}. What was the average score?
${name} ran three races. ${subj} finished in ${val1}, ${val2}, and ${val3} seconds. What is the average time?
Three boxes weigh ${val1}, ${val2}, and ${val3} pounds. What is their average weight?
${name} measured temperatures of ${val1}, ${val2}, and ${val3} degrees over three days. What is the average temperature?
Over three months, ${name} saved $${val1}, $${val2}, and $${val3}. What is the average amount saved per month?
${name} studied ${val1} minutes on Monday, ${val2} minutes on Tuesday, and ${val3} minutes on Wednesday. What is the average daily study time?
